question: In which forum was the ‘Global Initiative to reduce Land Degradation’ launched recently?
explanation:
The Global Initiative on Reducing Land Degradation was launched in the G 20 - Environment Ministerial Meeting (EMM) that was held in a virtual mode under the leadership of Saudi Arabia.
It aims to strengthen the implementation of existing guidelines on prevention of land degradation among the G20 member countries. In addition to the initiative on land degradation, the Global Coral Reef R&D Accelerator Platform was also launched which aims at R&D in all aspects of Coral Reef.
